title: Are filing patents useless for small inventors? - Quora

response.answer_text: I didn’t go watch your video, but technically YES, a patent has no value to someone who doesn’t have a few hundred thousand dollars in spare pocket change.I owned three U.S. Patents, but never had enough money to enforce them.For every infringer it costs at least 150k to take them to court.And even if you win, it is doubtful they have enough money to even cover the gas it cost you to go to court.How many infringement cases can you take on at your current income level?That will tell you if a patent is has value to you or not!
